projects.title: Sure-Odds
projects.intro: The project is a free to play sports pickem contest, where users can participate in various contest and win prices.

projects.title: Task tracker
projects.intro: A basic app for users to add, view, and manage tasks. Each task includes a title, description, and a status (e.g., to-do, in-progress, completed). Users can easily mark tasks as done or delete them. The app is designed to provide a straightforward way to keep track of personal tasks without unnecessary complexity.

projects.title: Face Recognition App
projects.intro: The Face Recognition app allows users to upload a photo or take a picture directly within the app to analyze facial features. It then detects the user's age and gender based on the facial data. The app provides quick, accurate results, making it easy for users to learn more about how facial recognition technology works. The interface is simple and intuitive, allowing for seamless image uploads and instant recognition.

projects.title: Animation Project
projects.intro: The project is a simple animation project that uses HTML, CSS, and js. The purpose of the project is to practice my animation with css and js.

projects.title: Github Finder
projects.intro: The application helps you search github users and some of their repositories.

projects.title: Calorie Tracker
projects.intro: This is a nutrition app that helps users keep track of their calorie intake.

projects.title: Komos.io
projects.intro: This is a comedy event discovery app that gives information about the events, and so much more, built with Angular.
